sense.name: act of arbitrating
sense.commentary: ARBITRATION[+event] arbitrament, arbitrement - the act of deciding as an arbiter; giving authoritative judgement
sense.examples: They submitted their disagreement to arbitration. Arbitration in the school is handled by the administration.

sense.name: law: hearing
sense.commentary: ARBITRATION[+event] (law) the hearing and determination of a dispute by an impartial referee agreed to by both parties (often used to settle disputes between labor and management)
sense.examples: The arbitration is scheduled for August 1st. They're hoping to settle this dispute quickly in arbitration.
